ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Iron Raptor! What is wrong with you? Your not going to let your own friends in the base when my team is supporting you Maximals? Dracona has been hard at work

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

"Iron Raptor! What is wrong with you? Your not going to let your own friends
in the base when my team is supporting you Maximals? Dracona has been hard
at work making weapons dfor you, and this is how you repay me?" Plintissa
said. Dracona sighed and pulled out a rifle, displaying it right in front of
Iron Raptor. (occ: RGDan isn't leader if he's not here, I want to move the
story along and RGDan is going to take forever, so Iron raptor can be leader
right now.) Plintissa sighed. "I just wanted to see you again, and seeing
that Liono appears to be nowhere around i figured i'd say this to you, Iron
Raptor. Why are you trying to destroy my team? We have been working for you
ever since the team started and your warrior blasts mine. Why is that?"
Plintissa asked Iron Raptor. Plintissa crossed her arms and waited for an
answer, very sad that Iron Raptor wasn't her friend anymore. That brung her
down to friends: 0...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 5:02 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * Iron Raptor shook her head, there was no hope in the Pit that she was
about to let Plintissa into the base without first having permission from
Liono. Besides, she had no idea what Plintissa was talking about when she
said that she had her own group, obviously a bunch of renegades and no mads.
> But then she looked down at Plintissa, the expression on her face clearly
saying that she wasn't convinced.*
>
> " No. If you have something to say then you can say it here."
>
> * She wasn't in the mood to argue about whether or not they were going
into the base and she was also on the verge of just leaving and returning to
the War room.
> Iron Raptor knew that Plintissa was her friend, or that was how it seemed.
But even with that she wasn't about to let her into the base, it would be a
violation of the codes of order. And she for one was going to obey them.*
>
>
